document_data.name: Trobriand's Crystalbrittle
document_data.mainbody: '''''Trobriand's crystalbrittle''''' was an [[arcane magic|arcane]] [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that weakened the physical durability of a target, making it easier to destroy.
document_data.Effects: The [[magic]] of the spell worked automatically on any unattended objects, but objects in someone's possession had a chance of resisting the spell's effects. The caster's skill determined the size of the object that could be affected. ''Trobriand's crystalbrittle'' was permanent once cast.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required as a [[material component]] a glass needle worth at least 100 [[gp]] to cast.
document_data.History: This spell was developed by [[Trobriand]] of [[Waterdeep]].
